Html:
Hi I have a WPF mapping application under progress. 
I have various regions on the UI, main ones like MainRegion (hosting a map). A side column containing the navigation control, table of map contect, etc. I have a View for a GPS connection which I want to open in the same space that the MainRegion uses on click of a button by splitting the space between the MapView and the GPSView, I want to invoke this view on a button click in another View-EditorView in EditorRegion ; and when this  GPSView is dismissed, the MapVIew should reclaim the complete space and the GPSRegion should also Hide.
How do I go about it? Need ideas asap.
Thanks

Hi,

You can find a similar behavior in the Reference Implementation inside the Position module, when you click the plus or minus buttons on any stock.

 

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
